location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to John Kaye, Accountant General, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing bills (not present) on the Military Paymaster for military disbursements at the Bushire station for April 1812 and the Marine Paymaster for the salary for Stephen Watson Henshaw, the Marine Agent, for April, May and June 1812.
